PvP: Anything, You one heavy everything

PvE: Jagged Edge + Swordmasters Guard + Relentless Strikes + En Garde
PvP: You’re a Hunter begging for a lightweight weapon, you’re using this for dodge cooldown reduction and to do the funny run
En Guarde best in slot for PvP, but ya know, OFA could be a lot of fun in PvE.
